org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.kafka.partitioner

类 KafkaPartitioner<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.kafka.partitioner.KafkaPartitioner<T>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable
    已过时。 
    This partitioner does not handle partitioning properly in the case of multiple topics, and has been deprecated. Please use FlinkKafkaPartitioner instead.

    @Deprecated
public abstract class KafkaPartitioner<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    It contains a open() method which is called on each parallel instance. Partitioners must be serializable!
    另请参阅:

      • open

        public void open(int parallelInstanceId,
                 int parallelInstances,
                 int[] partitions)
        已过时。 
        Initializer for the Partitioner.
        参数:
        parallelInstanceId - 0-indexed id of the parallel instance in Flink
        parallelInstances - the total number of parallel instances
        partitions - an array describing the partition IDs of the available Kafka partitions.
